rows.label: tev015101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev015101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Lara Nara about battle points (BP).

rows.label: tev015101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev015101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Lara Nara if he has any interesting news.

rows.label: tev015101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Lara Nara about enemy types.

rows.label: tev015101_SEL0051
rows.name:
Ask Lara Nara about materials
obtained from indigen appendages.

rows.label: tev015101_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Lara Nara about time limits on BLADE scouting.

rows.label: tev015101_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Lara Nara about recent developments.

rows.label: tev015101_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Lara Nara for tips on editing your profile.

rows.label: tev015101_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask Lara Nara about the Lifehold Core.

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh my! Is the new [ST:gender p1=guy p2=gal ] turning to little ol' me for help?
You're making me blush! Well, you bet I'll teach you.
I'll teach you everything you want to know![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0002
rows.name:
You earn battle points as your base level and class
rank rise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0003
rows.name:
You can spend those points to upgrade your skills
and Arts any time you like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0004
rows.name:
You can either upgrade your Arts to learn devastating
techniques, or upgrade your skills to heighten your
overall power. It's TOTALLY up to you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0005
rows.name:
I wonder what sort of BLADE you're going to become?
Mmm... Such possibilities...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0010
rows.name:
I heard there was a stalled Skell in the residential
district, so I went to see for myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0011
rows.name:
And would you believe it? A real looker of a BLADE
was standing right beside it. He was just my type![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0012
rows.name:
So I wonder if I could get Vandham to "coincidentally"
assign us both to the same mission. Heh heh heh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0022
rows.name:
By now, I'm sure you've noticed that different enemies
have different ways of locating their prey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0023
rows.name:
Like, some attack whoever they can see, while
others respond when they hear you approach.
Is this ringing any bells? Yes? Maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0024
rows.name:
Anyway, you'll need to deal with each one differently.
Like, when facing the visual type, you want to consider
its field of vision and avoid crossing it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0025
rows.name:
And when facing the keen-eared type,
it's not a great idea to wander too close.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0026
rows.name:
Of course you can always retreat from your foe,
but it's better to avoid difficult situations entirely
by simply thinking before you act.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0030
rows.name:
Defeating indigens and enemy machinery is a good
way to salvage all sorts of materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0031
rows.name:
But some rare materials can only be acquired when
you destroy a specific appendage of your enemy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0032
rows.name:
For example, when you destroy the head of a
petramand, it might drop its shell. Neat, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0033
rows.name:
And if you destroy its pincers, it may drop one of its
precious patterned claws.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG0034
rows.name:
Such rare materials can be sold for lots of money,
or even used to make powerful weapons. So you
should destroy as many appendages as you can![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG1024
rows.name:
Earlier, in the BLADE Scout Console, I found a BLADE
operative who looked as strong as he was handsome.
And believe you me, I spent a fortune to sign him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG1025
rows.name:
But then, like an idiot, I just stood there talking instead
of taking him on a mission, and he left as soon as the
contract expired. Can you believe that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG1026
rows.name:
Seriously, we were having a very pleasant conversation.
I don't think that kind of thing should count against
a contract's duration.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG1027
rows.name:
Oh dear. Just talking about this is deepening the
wrinkles on Yusof's brow. What a thoughtless BLADE
I am![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG1031
rows.name:
I know that Erio of the Definians has to be somewhere
in this city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG1032
rows.name:
But I don't think she intends to harm any humans.
I'm sure you can attest to that better than anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG1033
rows.name:
And if she does cause any problems, the Mediators-in-
love tag team of Yusof and I will put a stop to that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG1034
rows.name:
That's what we Mediators are for, after all.
Just leave the city to us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG1041
rows.name:
Ever since I typed up my profile, I've had BLADEs
reaching out to me from all over the place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG1042
rows.name:
If you want my advice, you'd do well to fill out
a proper profile for yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG1043
rows.name:
It stands to reason you'd want to know a bit about
someone before you consider hiring them, right?
All the more so if you're putting your life in their hands![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG1044
rows.name:
If you hope to be the sort of person that lots of other
BLADEs turn to, you need to sell yourself a little.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG1045
rows.name:
Let's see, now... What sort of juicy tidbits
should I amaze the public with next?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG2035
rows.name:
The team of Reclaimers that went out to repair the
Lifehold Core were taken straight to the maintenance
center when they came back to the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG2036
rows.name:
Their faces looked so pale! ...Well, I guess mimeosome
faces don't really turn pale, but that was the vibe I got
from them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG2037
rows.name:
What could have been inside the Lifehold Core that
made them so upset?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG2038
rows.name:
When they do reclaim and repair it, we'll be able to
return to our old bodies, right? So when's that going
to happen?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG2039
rows.name:
I hate to give up the chance to be together forever
with Yusof in our mimeosomes, but...
Well, we do miss our old bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG2042
rows.name:
I know that Erio of the Definians has to be somewhere
in this city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG2043
rows.name:
But I don't think she intends to harm any humans.
I'm sure you can attest to that better than anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG2044
rows.name:
And if she does cause any problems, the Mediators-in-
love tag team of Yusof and I will put a stop to that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_MSG2045
rows.name:
That's what we Mediators are for, after all.
Just leave the city to us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015103_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what Lara Nara intends to do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015103_MSG0001
rows.name:
What about you, [ST:playername ]?
Do you want to return to your old body?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015103_JNK1030
rows.name: Affirm[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015103_SEL1031
rows.name:
Say that you do wish to return
to your flesh-and-blood body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015103_JNK1040
rows.name: Deny[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015101_SEL1041
rows.name: Say that you'd prefer to stay in your mimeosome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015103_MSG0002
rows.name: I feel the same way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015103_MSG0003
rows.name:
As the last survivors of humanity, we have a duty to
flourish here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015103_MSG0004
rows.name:
Who knows? A few years from now, you could be
a parent![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015103_MSG0005
rows.name:
And if you need a babysitter, give me a ring.
Kids just love me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015103_MSG0006
rows.name: You're quite the realist, aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015103_MSG0007
rows.name:
We may have fought off the Ganglion,
but we still have indigens coming after us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015103_MSG0008
rows.name:
If we were all back in our real bodies, I suppose we'd
switch to fighting primarily in Skells. But it would still
take a while before we could stabilize the area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015103_MSG0009
rows.name:
And to accomplish that, we'd need the flexibility of
ground troops in mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015103_MSG0010
rows.name:
Maybe that's a duty we should entrust to people like
you who prefer to stay in mimeosomes. They can be
brave knights who ensure the prosperity of humankind![ST:wait ]
